pkgmetadata.longdescription: PdJ Sphinx Theme================This theme is a dark theme for sphinx documentation based on theread the docs theme.To install it, use pip:.. code-block:: sh $ pip install sphinx_pdj_themeTo enable it in your project documentation, set the following inyour conf.py file... code-block:: python import sphinx_pdj_theme html_theme = 'sphinx_pdj_theme' htm_theme_path = [sphinx_pdj_theme.get_html_theme_path()]
